body_html:
Regarding vectorization: that only happens in THTensor_(copy), but none of the code I'm replacing here actually uses THTensor_(copy). I'm just replacing THTensor_(copyByte), etc. which is just a tensor apply.

I can't delete the old code yet because the cuda copy code has a dependency on it.

body:
Regarding vectorization: that only happens in THTensor_(copy), but none of the code I'm replacing here actually uses THTensor_(copy). I'm just replacing THTensor_(copyByte), etc. which is just a tensor apply.

I can't delete the old code yet because the cuda copy code has a dependency on it.
